    • Method Detail

      • checkForEglError

        public static int checkForEglError(String caller)
        Calls EGL14#eglGetError() and logs an error if the last EGL call produced an error
        Parameters:
        caller - The calling routine name to log
        Returns:
        The egl error code that occurred or EGL14#EGL_SUCCESS EGL_SUCCESS if no error occurred
        See Also:
        eglGetError

      • getEglError

        public static int getEglError()
        Returns and error code produced by the last EGL call
        Returns:
        The egl error code that occurred or EGL14#EGL_SUCCESS EGL_SUCCESS if no error occurred

      • getEglErrorString

        Returns a human readable string for the most common EGL error strings
        Parameters:
        eglError - The egl error code
        Returns:
        A human readable string for the most common EGL error strings

        Returns detailed EGL support information for the current device
        Parameters:
        includeExtensions - A flag indicating if EGL extension support information should be included
        Returns:
        A string containing detailed EGL support information

                                    float[] matrix)
        Convert a 4x4 matrix stored in a float[16] array to a human readable string
        Parameters:
        header - A header to prepend to the output
        matrix - A 4x4 matrix
        Returns:
        A human readable string displaying the matrix values

      • getEglConfig

        public static EGLConfig getEglConfig(EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
                                     int version,
                                     boolean recordable)
        Returns the first matching EGLConfig for the specified EGLDisplay and version
        Parameters:
        eglDisplay - The EGL display
        version - The EGL version
        recordable - A flag indicating whether to require the EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE extension or not
        Returns:
        The first matching EGLConfig or null if one was not found

      • getEglConfig

                                     int version)
        Returns the first matching EGLConfig for the specified EGLDisplay and version
        Parameters:
        eglDisplay - The EGL display
        version - The EGL version
        Returns:

      • createEglContext

        public static EGLContext createEglContext(EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
                                          int version,
                                          EGLContext eglContextShared,
                                          boolean recordable)
        Create an EGLContext for the specified EGLDisplay and EGL version
        Parameters:
        eglDisplay - The EGL display
        version - The EGL version
        eglContextShared - Unless EGL14#EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, the newly created context will share EGL resources with the specified context
        recordable - Indicates that the newly created context should support the EGL_ANDROID_RECORDABLE extension for use with android.media.MediaCodec
        Returns:
        The newly created context or EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT if an error occurred

      • createEglContext

        public static EGLContext createEglContext(EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
                                          int version,
                                          EGLContext eglContextShared)
        Create an EGLContext for the specified EGLDisplay and EGL version
        Parameters:
        eglDisplay - The EGL display
        version - The EGL version
        eglContextShared - Unless EGL14#EGL_NO_CONTEXT is specified, the newly created context will share EGL resources with the specified context
        Returns:
        The newly created context or EGL14.EGL_NO_CONTEXT if an error occurred

      • createEglWindowSurface

                                                EGLDisplay eglDisplay,
                                                EGLConfig eglConfig)
        Wraps a native Android Surface or SurfaceTexture with an EGLSurface
        Parameters:
        surface - A Surface or SurfaceTexture instance to wrap with an EGLSurface
        eglDisplay - The EGL display
        eglConfig - The EGL config to use
        Returns:
        The newly created EGL surface or EGL14#EGL_NO_SURFACE if an error occurred

                                       EGLSurface eglSurface)
        Returns the dimensions for the specified EGLSurface
        Parameters:
        eglDisplay - The EGL display
        eglSurface - The EGL surface
        Returns:
        the dimensions of the surface, in pixels, or null if the size could not be determined

      • surfaceToEGLRotation

        public static int surfaceToEGLRotation(int surfaceRotation)
        Converts a Surface rotation angle to an EGL-based rotation angle
        Parameters:
        surfaceRotation - The rotation angle of the screen from its "natural" orientation.
        Returns:
        The equivalent EGl-based rotation angle
        See Also:
        The getRotation() method in the Android SDK Display class
